answers.author: Hannah Wolford
answers.text:
ICMA's Center for Performance Measurement collects data from it's participants on in-house & contractual custodial expenditures.  For FY2010, the average in-house custodial expenditure per square foot was $1.49 and the contractual average was $0.74 per square foot.
While these numbers do seem telling, it is important to note that jurisdictions may use a combination of in-house and contractual services that influence expenditure rates.  To obtain further information please visit www.icma.org/cpm

author: John Osgood
text: is there a municipal standard for the cost per square foot for in-house custodial services?  Same question for cities that contract it out?
title: municipal cost per square foot standard for in-house custodial services
